summary: Mickey O. Mills, M.D. voluntarily surrendered her medical license to avoid further investigation and prosecution for allegations including violations of the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP) terms and a previous Consent Order. The initial 2018 Consent Order found her guilty of unprofessional conduct, professional incompetence, addiction to controlled dangerous substances (CDS), and providing professional services while using CDS. Her license surrender is considered a final disciplinary action.
